text: hello english language learners welcome
to zen english my name is amy joy and i
will be a guest teacher here on zen
english i have my own youtube channel
called your favorite english teacher in
my last video we talked about starting
great conversations at a party or a
social gathering but how you start a
conversation at a party can be different
from how you start a conversation at
work so in this video i will be giving
you 10 questions to start great
conversations at work so let's go ahead
and get started the first five questions
are going to be if you are starting a
new job at a new company and you're
meeting all your co-workers for the
first time question number one how long
have you been at this company this is a
great conversation to find out who has
been there for a long time and who also
might be new like you question number
two
what's your favorite thing about working
here
you can get a lot of great responses and
get excited about your new job by
focusing on the positives and hearing
what the work culture is like question
number three what has been your favorite
project assignment or account to work on
and why
again we're focusing on the positive
aspects of this job and you might be
pleasantly surprised by your new
co-workers answers
question number four has your team done
any fun activities together
in the united states it is very common
for companies to facilitate or do
team bonding activities for example at
my husband's company they have gone wine
tasting they have gone to the zoo
together and they've taken cooking
classes so this is a great question to
ask so you can hear some fun stories
about past experiences of your
co-workers that are not entirely related
to the job you're doing and similarly
question number five how are the holiday
parties here many companies in the us
host holiday parties one year i went
with my husband to go bowling and that
was really really fun and of course
there are always some really good
stories that come when you get your
co-workers and alcohol together so this
might elicit some funny responses and
you might even learn something fun about
your co-workers and before we move on to
the next set of questions if you have
found this video helpful so far make
sure you like it and subscribe to zen
english also go ahead and check out my
channel your favorite english teacher so
you can keep improving your english with
me now let's go ahead and reverse roles
maybe you have been working at this
company for a while and a new employee
joins your team here are five questions
to start a great conversation with the
new employee what company did you work
at before what was that like or how was
that this is a great question just to
get some general background information
question number seven
how does this company compare to your
old one here you can get a new
perspective on the company you're
currently working for and also hear what
other companies are doing in your
industry and question number eight why
did you come to work here or why did you
choose this company clearly there was
something that they liked about this
company and asking this question might
show you some common interests or values
that you and this new employee share and
question number nine what are you most
excited about working here again in this
question we're focusing on the positive
and trying to get to know what this new
employee is excited about and question
number 10 how do you like working here
so far maybe this person has only been
working here for a day or maybe they
have been working here for a month but
either way this is a great question to
get to know this person and also hear
how you might make their transition a
little bit smoother
now let's see these 10 questions in a
full conversation between amanda and her
new co-worker
ally hey i'm amanda nice to meet you
hi i'm ali nice to meet you too how long
have you been at this company
oh well about two years now what company
did you work at before
infosystems
oh nice a few other people here used to
work there too i'll introduce you later
how was working for them
it was good i got a lot of experience
but i'm looking forward to something new
definitely we're excited you're here how
do you like working here so far
well it has only been a week so i'm just
getting the hang of everything but i'm
grateful i got the job
yeah so why did you choose this company
well i like that it's a startup i like
the fast pace and being a part of
something from the beginning
what's your favorite thing about working
here
well i like that i get to be really
creative and the work-life balance is
really good i don't usually work after
five and in the summer we have fridays
off
oh also i love my co-workers
i bet everyone seems really nice so far
has your team done any fun activities
together yeah actually we did a team
bonding activity about a month ago and
we did a cooking class then we went to
happy hour afterward and james had too
much to drink it was a good time
how does this company compare to your
old one did you have a lot of team
activities
no not at all it was all business and
pretty boring honestly how are the
holiday parties here oh they're so much
fun last year we all went bowling but i
promise we get work done here too
do you what has been your favorite
project to work on last year we had an
advertising campaign and i managed
everyone on the team
our ad actually was in times square
which was really exciting
no way
yep so what are you most excited about
working here well originally i was just
excited about becoming a manager but now
you've made me excited about all the
parties and maybe seeing my work in
times square
well i think you'll really like working
here i have to go into my next meeting
but will i see you at happy hour tonight
yes definitely cool nice to meet you ali
you too amanda and like i said in my
last video it can be really beneficial
and boost your confidence if you
practice asking and answering these
questions beforehand so to give you a
little bit of practice and build that
confidence go ahead and write your
answers to any of these questions in the
comments below and if you found this
video helpful make sure you like it and

and subscribe to my channel your

so much for watching this video i hope
